alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN ITASCA AND SOUTHEASTERN KOOCHICHING COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM CDT... At 230 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Nett Lake, to 12 miles northwest of Togo, to 10 miles east of Effie, to near Bigfork, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Nett Lake around 245 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Bois Forte Band Nett Lake Area, Coon Lake, Scenic State Park and Bois Forte Band Deer Creek Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
